document.docAuthor: Yang, Yuxia, Ge, Shujuan, Yang, Xingke & Liu, Haoyu
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of the species of Stenothemus from Southwest China (Coleoptera, Cantharidae), with the descriptions of five new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic revision of the species of Stenothemus from Southwest China (Coleoptera, Cantharidae), with the descriptions of five new species

.
Body length (both sexes): 7.2‒10.6 mm ; width: 1.5‒2.5 mm .

Female ABDOMINAL STERNITE VIII ( Fig. 3E ). Obliquely narrowed posteriorly and slightly sinuate, lateroapical angles obtusely triangular, posterior margin deeply and triangularly emarginate in middle and widely
China ( Shaanxi , Gansu , Henan , Hubei , Sichuan , Xizang ). New records for Shaanxi , Gansu , Henan , Hubei , Xizang .
The female reproductive system and dorsal and lateral views of the aedeagus for this species are described and illustrated for the first time.
